description:
The previous Shogun’s younger brother, Ashikaga Yoshiaki, wants to become the next shogun. He tells the Asakura Clan, who had been sheltering him, that he is going to go see Nobunaga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je veux devenir shogun un jour !
Someday I Want to Be the Shogun!!
いつか将軍になりた~い!!
